title: SEC confirms X account was hacked in SIM swapping attack
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission confirmed today that its X account was hacked through a SIM-swapping attack on the cell phone number associated with the account. [...]

title: Cracked macOS apps drain wallets using scripts fetched from DNS records
description: Hackers are using a stealthy method to deliver to macOS users information-stealing malware through DNS records that hide malicious scripts. [...]

title: FTC orders Intuit to stop pushing "free" software that isn't really free
description: Today, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) ordered Intuit to stop promoting its software products and services as "free" unless they're actually free for all consumers. [...]

title: Malicious web redirect scripts stealth up to hide on hacked sites
description: Security researchers looking at more than 10,000 scripts used by the Parrot traffic direction system (TDS) noticed an evolution marked by optimizations that make malicious code stealthier against security mechanisms. [...]

title: Apple fixes first zero-day bug exploited in attacks this year
description: Apple released security updates to address this year's first zero-day vulnerability exploited in attacks that could impact iPhones, Macs, and Apple TVs. [...]

title: Ivanti: VPN appliances vulnerable if pushing configs after mitigation
description: Ivanti warned admins to stop pushing new device configurations to appliances after applying mitigations because this will leave them vulnerable to ongoing attacks exploiting two zero-day vulnerabilities. [...]

title: loanDepot cyberattack causes data breach for 16.6 million people
description: Mortgage lender loanDepot says that approximately 16.6 million people had their personal information stolen in a ransomware attack disclosed earlier this month. [...]

title: loanDepot says ransomware gang stole data of 16.6 million people
description: Mortgage lender loanDepot says that approximately 16.6 million people had their personal information stolen in a ransomware attack disclosed earlier this month. [...]

title: Trezor support site breach exposes personal data of 66,000 customers
description: Trezor issued an alert following a security breach on January 17, 2024, when unauthorized access was gained to their third-party support ticketing portal. [...]

title: Hackers start exploiting critical Atlassian Confluence RCE flaw
description: Security researchers are observing exploitation attempts for the CVE-2023-22527 remote code execution flaw vulnerability that affects outdated versions of Atlassian Confluence servers. [...]
